articles.author: Clinton Payne
articles.title: Top Sydney hoops secure Cox Plate, Melbourne Cup rides - Racenet
articles.description: Three of Sydney’s top jockeys are awaiting signoff from the Victorian government to head to Melbourne in the coming weeks to ride in the Cox Plate and Melbourne Cup.
articles.content:
